Visual C++ 2008 x64.Description: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable Package (x64) installs runtime components of Visual C++ Libraries required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer that does not have Visual C++ 2008 installed

Visual C++ 2008 x86.Description: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable Package (x86) installs runtime components of Visual C++ Libraries required to run applications developed with Visual C++ on a computer that does not have Visual C++ 2008 installed

Java.Description: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is a set of software tools for development of Java applications

PhysX.Description: NVIDIA PhysX is a physics engine middleware SDK developed by NVIDIA, designed to provide real-time physics simulation in games and other applications
